TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IReferenceService

Docs.summary: Provides an interface for obtaining references to objects within a project by name or type, obtaining the name of a specified object, and for locating the parent of a specified object within a designer project.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The IReferenceService interface provides the following methods:
- The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService.GetReference%2A> method returns the component with the specified name, or `null` if no component with the specified name was found.
- The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService.GetName%2A> method returns the name associated with the specified component.
- The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService.GetComponent%2A> method returns the parent container of the specified component.
- The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService.GetReferences%2A> method returns an array of references to all project components, or all project components of an optionally specified type.
## Examples The following example control uses the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IReferenceService.GetReferences%2A> method of the IReferenceService interface to obtain a list of components in the current design mode project of the type of the currently selected component.
[!code-vb[IReferenceServiceExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.componentmodel._134_1.vb)] [!code-cs[IReferenceServiceExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.componentmodel._134_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[IReferenceServiceExample#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.componentmodel._134_1.cpp)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.IComponent GetComponent(object reference) cil managed

Docs.param: The object to retrieve the parent component for.
Docs.summary: Gets the component that contains the specified component.
Docs.returns: The base that contains the specified object, or if no parent component exists.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetName(object reference) cil managed

Docs.param: The object to return the name of.
Docs.summary: Gets the name of the specified component.
Docs.returns: The name of the object referenced, or if the object reference is not valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The name of each component sited in a design time project is set in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite.Name%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> where the component is sited.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetReference(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the component to return a reference to.
Docs.summary: Gets a reference to the component whose name matches the specified name.
Docs.returns: An object the specified name refers to, or if no reference is found.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object[] GetReferences() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets all available references to project components.
Docs.returns: An array of all objects with references available to the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object[] GetReferences(class System.Type baseType) cil managed

Docs.param: The type of object to return references to instances of.
Docs.summary: Gets all available references to components of the specified type.
Docs.returns: An array of all available objects of the specified type.
